sentences.en: As a group, today's old people are still relatively deprived.
sentences.cn: 总的来说，当今的老年人依然相对贫困。

sentences.en: Do you still have Julie’s phone number?
sentences.cn: 你还留着朱莉的电话号码吗？

sentences.en: English has hurt me a thousand times, but I still regard it as my first love.
sentences.cn: 英语伤我千百遍，我待英语如初恋。

sentences.en: He still had a lot of pent-up anger to release.
sentences.cn: 他还有很多强压的愤怒要发泄。

sentences.en: I still haven’t finished painting the spare room.
sentences.cn: 我还没粉刷完那间空房间。

sentences.en: I still love you even though I'd like to wring your neck.
sentences.cn: 虽然我想掐死你，但我还是爱你的。

sentences.en: I still think I have a bit more to offer.
sentences.cn: 我还是认为我能再稍微多付出一点儿。

sentences.en: Keep still while I tie your shoe.
sentences.cn: 别动，我给你系鞋带。

sentences.en: She'll crucify me if she finds you still here.
sentences.cn: 如果她发现你还在这儿，她会狠狠地教训我。

sentences.en: Some of the older telephones still only accept tokens.
sentences.cn: 一些较老式的电话机仍然只收代币。

sentences.en: The army is still one of the last male bastions.
sentences.cn: 军队仍然是男人占据的最后堡垒之一。

sentences.en: The final word will still come from the Secretary of State.
sentences.cn: 最后仍然要由国务卿来定夺。

sentences.en: The ground beneath them trembled, then stilled.
sentences.cn: 他们脚下的大地开始颤抖，然后平静了下来。

sentences.en: The new system is still in the planning stages.
sentences.cn: 新体系仍处于规划阶段。

sentences.en: The pockmarks made by her bullets are still on the wall.
sentences.cn: 墙上仍然有她的子弹留下的凹坑。

sentences.en: the still waters of the lake
sentences.cn: 平静的湖面

sentences.en: Their ears were still attuned to the sounds of the London suburb.
sentences.cn: 他们依然很熟悉伦敦市郊的喧闹声。

sentences.en: There are many people who still find the act of abortion abhorrent.
sentences.cn: 仍有很多人对堕胎行为表示厌恶。

sentences.en: These incidents suggest the peace in Northern Ireland is still brittle.
sentences.cn: 这些事件表明北爱尔兰的和平仍然很脆弱。

sentences.en: We stood still and watched as the deer came closer.
sentences.cn: 我们一动不动地站着，看那头鹿走近。

sentences.en: When Eleanor returned, I was still sitting glumly on the settee.
sentences.cn: 埃莉诺回来的时候，我还闷闷不乐地坐在长沙发上。

words.tran_cn: 静止的，不动的；寂静的，平静的；不起泡的
[化工]蒸馏；使…静止；使…平静下来

phrases.tran_cn: n. 照相机；静物摄影机；静物照相机
良心的呼声（参见《列王纪•上》19:12)
(谚)静水流深（平静或沉稳的风格可能隐藏激昂的本质）

trans.tran_en: up to a particular point in time and continuing at that moment
a photograph of a scene from a film
up to a particular point in time and continuing at that moment

trans.tran_cn: 蒸馏；使…静止；使…平静下来
